Style/ArgumentsForwarding.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

AllowOnlyRestArgument: True (type: bool)
UseAnonymousForwarding: True (type: bool)
RedundantRestArgumentNames: ['args', 'arguments'] (type: list)
RedundantKeywordRestArgumentNames: ['kwargs', 'options', 'opts'] (type: list)
RedundantBlockArgumentNames: ['blk', 'block', 'proc'] (type: list)
